title: Tesla
description: Tesla, Inc. is an American multinational automotive and clean energy company headquartered in Austin, Texas

title: Alibaba
description: Alibaba Group Holding Limited, also known as Alibaba, is a Chinese multinational technology company specializing in e-commerce, retail, Internet, and technology

title: TAL Education Group
description: TAL Education Group is a Chinese holding company that offers after-school education and tutoring for students in primary and secondary school.
